item.title:
today I had the fortune of going through banks‚Äô papers/articles and see how they run regressions to create their rates ‚Äúfair value model‚Äù
turns out there are tons of regressions w 90% R2 out there. I think I should ask to borrow some then maybe I can crawl out of this drawdown
item.dc:creator: @quantymacro

item.title:
R to @quantymacro: ngl to say I‚Äôm disappointed is probs an understatement. the only silver lining is it wasn‚Äôt an error ‚Äî the strategy did what it was designed to & got rekt
hopefully in a few months things recover Inshallah
if you ever took quant advice from me pls save yourself

item.title: question for immigrants in the UK who‚Äôs not planning to stay here forever: are you contributing to/maxxing pension? is it worth it? what are the things I need to be aware of/consider? I see/hear conflicting things from ppl ard me so I‚Äôm asking the wisdom of the crowd

item.title:
the multiplication table 12 has always been hard for me. for the life of me I can‚Äôt memorise it. I only can memorise up until 12x5=60. if I wanna calculate 12x8, I have to do 12x5 + 12 + 12 + 12=96 in my head to get the answer.
I‚Äôm a quant btw
item.dc:creator: @quantymacro

item.title: it's actually insane that we're in Jan 2025, & they're opening app for 2026 Summer. the competition must be crazy high that it gets to this point. cant help but to wonder if this is optimal in terms of hiring though. but anyways Steve Cohen is a billionaire & I'm a sub seller so

item.title:
Okay LASSO is meh, but what makes Ridge good? what made me fell in love with ridge
new year, another year where I will run thousands of Ridge Regressions. if you're not part of the Church of Ridge Penalty, it's still not too late to join
as usual giving access to some who RT
